https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/d7VXVRhfVhwBHYZft9o9jj4qOZr.jpg A man leaves everything behind to travel aimlessly through France, letting himself be guided only by the people and landscapes he encounters: four days and four nights of wandering, during which his lover tries to locate him via Grindr, a smartphone dating app. 4 Days in France
